effect: Thief (|''Theft''}}, rom. ''Shīfu'') is a spell card that can be found in the Greed Island game. It allows a player to steal a random card from the target player's designated slots.

name: Return
effect: Return (, rom. ''Ritān'') is a spell card that can be found in the Greed Island game. It allows for a player to instantly transport back to a previously visited city.

name: Leave

name: Drift
effect: Drift (, rom. ''Dorifuto'') is a spell card that can be found in the Greed Island game. It transports the caster to a random city or town they have not visited yet.

name: Collision
effect: Collision (, rom. ''Korijon'') is a spell card that can be found in the Greed Island game. It allows the caster to be transported to the location of a previously unknown game player.

name: Levy
effect: Levy (, rom. ''Rebi'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. It allows a player to steal a random card from every player within a 20 meter radius.

name: Drawbridge
effect: Drawbridge (lit. }}, rom. ''Kyassuru Gēto'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. It protects the caster against a single short-range regular spell used by another player.

name: Mug
effect: Mug (lit. |''Robbery''}}, rom. ''Robu'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. It allows a player to steal any one card from the target player.

name: Blackout Curtain
effect: Blackout Curtain (, rom. ''Burakkuauto Kāten'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. It allows a player to protect themselves from the next "Peek" or "Fluoroscopy" cast on them.

name: Holy Water
effect: Holy Water (, rom. ''Hōrī Uōtā'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. It protects the caster from other player's attack spells 10 times.

name: Trace
effect: Trace (|''Pursuit''}}, rom. ''Torēsu'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. It allows the caster to view the target's location at all times.

effect: Rock Toss (lit. }}, rom. ''Sutōn Surō'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. It allows a player to destroy a random card from another player's free slots.

name: Guidepost
effect: Guidepost (, rom. ''Gaido Posuto'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. When cast, it reveals the location of a restricted card of the caster's choice, except for #000.

name: Analysis
effect: Analysis (, rom. ''Anarishisu'') is a spell card found in the Greed Island game. It allows the caster to read the text of a numbered card of their choice, except for #000.
